projects.title: davebyrne.site (This Page)
projects.subtitle: A simple static website using nothing but HTML, CSS, and some jQuery, hosted on AWS using Amplify & Route53
projects.blurb: The 2nd version of my personal portfolio page. The first version utilised a react template from another engineer. For version 2, I wanted to go back to basics and focus on styling and accessibility.

projects.title: PI Planning Tools
projects.subtitle: A Command Line Tool for Reviewing SAFe Program Increments
projects.blurb: An example of using python to help my everyday job as a scrum master, this project generates a series of overviews that A. help to ensure a successful PI Planning event and, B. to help track progress during a PI. Please note, this is a personal project built over many years that was never intended to be shared and so, it is presented warts and all

projects.title: <q>Songs I'm Listening To</q>
projects.subtitle: A FastAPI and React App I built for fun and learning
projects.blurb: To learn more about API development in Python, API security, React, ORM, analytics, and unit testing, I turned to another love of mine - music. I built this web-app that displays some of the songs I have been listening to recently that resonated with me. I hope that long term, this will help me with finding those elusive songs I spend an age trying to remember the name of.
